metadata.synopsis: The player is surprised by a gremishka (angry magical hairless cat-like creature)  that jumps out of a chest some gith kids are pushing around with Mage Hand in the gith crèche.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Happens when the gremishka breaks out of the chest.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: That's what was in there? Those little shits.
